pkgmetadata.longdescription: Exact Finite-Sample Value-at-Risk Back-Testing // Provides fast dynamic-programming algorithms in 'C++'/'Rcpp' (with pure 'R' fallbacks) for the exact finite-sample distributions and p-values of Christoffersen (1998) independence (IND) and conditional-coverage (CC) VaR backtests. For completeness, it also provides the exact unconditional-coverage (UC) test following Kupiec (1995) via a closed-form binomial enumeration. See Christoffersen (1998) doi:10.2307/2527341 and Kupiec (1995) doi:10.3905/jod.1995.407942.
